messages.message: 'formSchema' is assigned a value but only used as a type.
Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

messages.message: The 'reviews' logical expression could make the dependencies of useMemo Hook (at line 45) change on every render. To fix this, wrap the initialization of 'reviews' in its own useMemo() Hook.
React Hook "useMemo" is called conditionally. React Hooks must be called in the exact same order in every component render. Did you accidentally call a React Hook after an early return?
